text: 13.2: Stt 18.1-8; 19.1-3; Mt 25.35; Ro 12.13; 1 T 3.2; 1 Pi 4.9Maaŋ muuŋgip, harigi ŋgui gumgi nden han zɨrga, nde mbe ndiav wari wo phenin vui tɨva thamtha thari. Nde khueŋ kaŋgi, fhum gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga muuŋgi, nza gumgi guari ndiga wari wo phenin zegap, mbe gari. Mbe mba ndiga wari wo phenin zegi gumgi, mbe Fhe Bakɨme enseri ma.
